item.title: MIUI V14.0.22.12.5.DEV Fastboot update for Redmi K50 Ultra China

Size: 7.4 GB

MD5: 6debcd7d0a9823015832d1d813f4c06b

Bug fixes and system optimizations.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.7.0.ULFCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K50 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K50 Ultra China

Codename: diting

Version: OS1.0.7.0.ULFCNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: 31e78d5affd0c6f4dadfa85eaa76d6ca

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Optimized memory usage to improve the smoothness of TikTok (Douyin)
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Control center]
Fix: Some toggles occasionally failed to work
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can notify you about your flights and train
Optimization: App vault loading speed
Fix: Zoom animation was abnormal when tapping the Music widget
Fix: A rare display issue occurred when adding the Clock widget
Fix: An incorrect name for Travel assistant was shown in Recents
[Calculator]
Optimization: Improved the sensitivity of Calculator buttons
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Single-line notification icons were not fully displayed
Fix: Blank notifications appeared with only the icon displayed
Fix: The 5G icon in the status bar wasn't fully displayed after switching font size or changing to a third party font

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.6.0.ULFMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12T Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12T Pro Global

Codename: diting

Version: OS1.0.6.0.ULFMIXM | 14.0

Size: 6.8 GB

MD5: d1764b557402bd595e2890030882af63

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to August 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Fix: Video apps weren't displayed correctly when switching screen orientation
Fix: The size of pinned floating windows for some games was incorrect
[Lock screen]
New: A switch for a feature that allows long pressing Home screen to edit it

Download: Here
